Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repeated code into a helper method
Improvements.Description: The code for creating a HttpHost and HttpRoute from a URL is written three times. It can be refactored into a helper method to improve readability and maintainability of the code.

Improvements.Improvement: Use constants for repeated literal values
Improvements.Description: The URL strings are used multiple times in the code. They can be replaced with constants to avoid potential typing errors and improve maintainability.
